title: Critical configuration
description: Critical configuration for a Sourcegraph site.

auth.userOrgMap.description: Ensure that matching users are members of the specified orgs (auto-joining users to the orgs if they are not already a member). Provide a JSON object of the form `{"*": ["org1", "org2"]}`, where org1 and org2 are orgs that all users are automatically joined to. Currently the only supported key is `"*"`.
